title: The Chain
description: In his premiere novel, THE CHAIN, Timothy Patrick Kirby combines science fiction with psychological horror as we follow cataclysmic events as they unfold in the life of Kelly Furlong, a young rural mother and wife, who is about to embark on the most significant adventure in the history of the world. And ultimately, she will discover that the chain of life in the universe MUST remain unbroken...or else.
author: Timothy Patrick Kirby
